Class RemoteEndpointStatement

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Statement, Wrapper

    public class RemoteEndpointStatement
extends JenaStatement
    A Jena JDBC statement against a remote endpoint
